data.title: Copa Inframundo HN 2019
data.meta_description: The World Cube Association governs competitions for mechanical puzzles that are operated by twisting groups of pieces, commonly known as 'twisty puzzles'. The most famous of these puzzles is the Rubik's Cube, invented by professor Rubik from Hungary. A selection of these puzzles are chosen as official events of the WCA.
data.text:
Create a WCA account here if you don't have one.

If this is not your first competition, associate your WCA ID to your WCA account here.

Register for this competition here.

There is a competitor limit of 80 competitors.

The base registration fee for this competition is L250 (Honduran Lempira).

Registration fees won't be refunded under any circumstance.

On the spot registrations will be accepted with a base registration fee of L250 (Honduran Lempira).

El costo de la participación es de L250.00 e incluye inscripción a todas las categorias.

El registro se considera completo cuando se ha efectuado el depósito, se han seguido las instrucciones y el competidor aparece en la siguiente lista. Si el competidor ya ha participado antes, debe registrarse utilizando su ID de la WCA, si es primera competencia los datos deben ser correctos (sólo primera letra de cada nombre y apellido en mayúscula, escrito correctamente, fecha de nacimiento verdadera, etc)

Enviar un correo a

inframundohn@gmail.com indicando los datos de la persona inscrita asi como las categorìas a participar.

Para estar inscrito se deberá proceder con los tres pasos indicados:

1) Inscripción en línea.

2) Depositar en BAC el total del valor de inscripción.

3) Enviar correo afirmando su participación y adjunto el comprobante de pago.

Para más información revisar la pestaña "Información/Payments".

The cost of participation is L250.00 and includes registration to all categories.

The registration is considered complete whenever the payment has been done, respective instructions have been followed and the competitor's name appears on the following list. If the person has competed before, the WCA ID must be written. If the person is a new competitor, the information submitted must be correct (only first letter on each name/last name capitalized, name spelled correctly, correct birth date, etc)

Send a mail to inframundohn@gmail.com indicating the information of the person registered as well as the events to participate.

To be registered you must proceed with this three steps indicated:

1) Online registration.

2) Deposit in BAC the total of the inscription value.

3) Send mail stating your participation and attach the proof of payment.

For more information check the "Información/ Payments" tab.
